title: Bronze or silver players wanted: To help me get out of Bronze and into silver by this thursday!
body: I know I've been bad recently, mostly because of my team, So what I need is some Bronze or Silver plays to help me get out of Bronze by this thursday! Please you kind and nice words down there, Cheers if you do{{summoner:30}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Hodgkinson,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=djyHLVfK,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-13T08:58:41.548+0000)
>
> I know I&#039;ve been bad recently, **mostly because of my team**

About the bold part, that is what I had in mind too.
Until I ask a master-rank friend to duo rank with me, ended up losing because I played badly.
Yes.. even a master-rank friend could not help me win the game.

As long as the mindset of "mostly because of my team" is there, we cannot climb up.
Because, the common denominator of all our losses is.. **us**

I can help you.
In fact, I have helped duo ranking many bronze friends to reach silver
But the very first thing for you to do to climb up is to remove the "mostly because of my team" mindset and start improve your own play.
Sounds harsh and arrogant, but that is how it is.

Add me if you want
